attributes.action: Exchange of driving licences issued in Taiwan, UAE, Ukraine and North Macedonia.
attributes.background: Allow the exchange of driver's licenses issued in the United Arab Emirates, Taiwan, Ukraine and Northern Macedonia for the British equivalent.
